about_the_game:
You find yourself in an ancient graveyard, where mysterious statues and forgotten tombs hide ancient secrets.
Under the moonlight, you solve puzzles, revealing a portal to dark caves.
Inside, dark corridors await you, littered with bodies but no living souls.
And be cautious: every step could lead to a new horror or open doors where everything is already forgotten.

Move forward boldly, and may the Angels guard you! 🕯🗝

Game features:
- 3D graphics: visually appealing game
- Atmosphere: immerse yourself in a dark world where every step could lead to a new discovery or horror.
- Graphics: create an atmosphere that will make you focus on every dark detail.
- Dark mysteries: Your investigations will lead you to ancient writings on the walls, forgotten artifacts, and dark secrets. Delve deeper.

name: Call of the Grave

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (4 GB)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
